data.title: Peter Guinness
data.meta_description: Peter Guinness is an English film, television and theatre actor. He played Ari in series 5's The Diamond of the Day: Part One. He has appeared in over fifty television productions and over ten films. Guinness has also appeared onstage in an adaptation of The Pianist. The Keep, (1983), Film...
data.text:
Peter Guinness is an English film, television and theatre actor. He played Ari in series 5's The Diamond of the Day: Part One.

Career[]

He has appeared in over fifty television productions and over ten films. Guinness has also appeared onstage in an adaptation of The Pianist.

Film and television work[]

The Keep, (1983), Film

Zorro, (1990), TV series

The Adventures of the Creeping Man, (1991 PBS TV series), The Casebook of Sherlock Holmes,played Wilcox

The Cloning of Joanna May, (1992) TV mini-series

Alien 3, (1992), Film

Highlander: The Series (1993), TV, episode "Nowhere To Run"

HeartBeat TV episode Riders on the storm 1993

Cadfael, (1997), TV, series 3 episode 3 "The Raven in the Foregate"

Sleepy Hollow (1999), Film

Bleak House (2005), TV series

Rudyard Kipling: A Remembrance Tale (2006), TV documentary

Hogfather (2006), TV film

Seconds From Disaster (2007) Narrator Series 3, TV documentary

The Bill, TV Series

Casualty, TV Series

Dreamland, (2009) TV (voice)

Silent Witness, (2009), TV, "The Lost Child" Parts 1 & 2

Red Cap, TV Series

Freaks, Music video

Centurion, (2010), Film

Hidden, (2011), TV Series

Personal life[]
